channel.title: VR on Nick Desaulniers
channel.description: Recent content in VR on Nick Desaulniers

item.title: My SIGGRAPH 2015 Experience
item.description: I was recently lucky enough to get to attend my first SIGGRAPH conference this year. While I didn’t attend any talks, I did spend some time in the expo. Here is a collection of some of the neat things I saw at SIGGRAPH 2015. Sorry it’s not more collected; I didn’t have the intention of writing a blog post until after folks kept asking me “how was it?” VR Most booths had demos on VR headsets.
